about_the_game:
Build magical villages across serene, ever-changing realms. Create thriving settlements, gather arcane energy, then teleport to new lands and start anew. Discover endless possibilities as you construct settlements across the Arcane Realms.

Start your Magical Village

Start with simple structures like houses and mana stones to lay the foundation of your village. Design each settlement to reflect your creativity, balancing aesthetics and strategy.

Gather Arcane Energy

Every building you place generates arcane energy, fueling your village’s growth. Use this energy to expand your settlement and work toward constructing your key to other realms: the Teleportation Plaza.

Build Advanced Structures

Construct advanced buildings by surrounding them with the right foundational structures. Unlock powerful benefits, earn more arcane energy, and bring your magical village to life.

Explore New Realms

With your Teleportation Plaza complete, teleport to a brand new realm to start fresh or stay a while and keep building. Each new land offers a unique canvas for your creativity, ensuring no two villages are ever the same.

Immerse yourself in Arcane Realms, a laid-back, magical village-building adventure with endless possibilities. 

Features:

  • Procedurally generated landscapes for you to build on

  • Place structures on the map to build your village

  • Generate Arcane Energy for each structure you build

  • Create advanced structures by surrounding them with the right buildings

  • Use your Arcane Energy to purchase more buildings

  • Teleport to a new map when you're ready
